ssid.name: SSID
ssid.description: The name of the WiFi network you want to host.

wpa_passphrase.name: WPA2 Password
wpa_passphrase.description: The password for the WiFi network. Must be at least 8 characters long.

channel.name: 2.4GHz Channel Number
channel.description: The channel to broadcast on. If unsure; either 1, 6 or 11 is recommended.

address.name: Host IP Address
address.description: This will be the IP address of the Homeassistant device on the new subnet, acting as the router and (optionally) DHCP/DNS server.

netmask.name: Subnet Netmask
netmask.description: The netmask of the hosted subnet. Leave default if uncertain.

broadcast.name: Subnet Broadcast Address
broadcast.description: The broadcast address of the network. This must always be the last address in the subnet. Leave default if unsure.

interface.name: Network Interface
interface.description: The wireless network interface to use to host the network. On a Raspberry Pi, the builtin one will be wlan0 (default).

hide_ssid.name: Hide Network SSID
hide_ssid.description: Whether to hide the network SSID. Use with caution.

dhcp.name: Enable DHCP Server
dhcp.description: Whether to enable a DNSMASQ DHCP server on the subnet.

dhcp_start_addr.name: DHCP IP Range Start
dhcp_start_addr.description: The start of the IP address range to automatically assign to devices.

dhcp_end_addr.name: DHCP IP Range End
dhcp_end_addr.description: The end of the IP address range to automatically assign to devices.

allow_mac_addresses.name: MAC Address Allowlist
allow_mac_addresses.description: A list of the MAC addresses that are allowed to connect to the network. Any other devices will be blocked. This overrides the 'MAC Address Blocklist' option.

deny_mac_addresses.name: MAC Address Blocklist
deny_mac_addresses.description: A list of the MAC addresses that are NOT allowed to connect to the network. Any other devices will be allowed.

hostapd_config_override.name: HOSTAPD Custom Configuration
hostapd_config_override.description: A list of options to append to the `hostapd.conf` file. Don't touch if you don't know what you're doing.

client_internet_access.name: Enable Internet Access
client_internet_access.description: Whether to allow internet access for clients

client_dns_override.name: Client DNS
client_dns_override.description: A list of DNS server IPs to use. If empty, will use Homeassistant's default DNS servers.

dnsmasq_config_override.name: DNSMASQ Custom Configuration
dnsmasq_config_override.description: A list of options to append to the `dnsmasq.conf` file. Don't touch if you don't know what you're doing.
